summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TripStars Task Management System with new modular backend structure and Phase 2 comments feature. All backend APIs (26/26 tests) and frontend functionality working perfectly. New comments API endpoints, task detail page with comments section, and role-based permissions all functioning as expected.
passed_tests: Backend: All 26 API tests passed (100% success rate)
Backend: New comments API endpoints (POST, GET, PATCH, DELETE)
Backend: Comments authorization (team members can only comment on their tasks)
Backend: Modular structure with proper FastAPI organization
Frontend: Login functionality for all three user roles
Frontend: Dashboard with updated stats (showing completed tasks)
Frontend: Role-based navigation (Admin: Dashboard+All Tasks+User Management, Manager: Dashboard+All Tasks, Team Member: Dashboard+My Tasks)
Frontend: Task cards are clickable and navigate to detail page
Frontend: Task detail page with comments section
Frontend: Comments display with user name and timestamp
Frontend: Task status updates by team members
Frontend: My Tasks page (Team Member only)
Integration: Comments API integration working perfectly
